title: Rito
description: Rito is a bookmark management service that uses the ATProtocol.

ogp.title: Rito
ogp.description: A social bookmarking platform connecting users and developers.

allbookmark.title: Bookmarks
allbookmark.description: Manage Bluesky and websites together with your Bluesky account
allbookmark.longdescription: You can manage Bluesky and websites with your Bluesky account. Add comments and tags to bookmarks for convenient organization.

atproto.title: Build with ATProtocol
atproto.description: Supports ATProtocol and stores everything in your PDS
atproto.longdescription: Fully compatible with ATProtocol, all data is stored in your PDS.

ownerbenefit.title: Owner Verified Comments
ownerbenefit.description: Owner of ATProtocol-based products can add descriptions to their products
ownerbenefit.longdescription: Product owners can create special bookmarks that display their service description at the top of the bookmark list.

login.title: Login
login.titleDescription: Log in with your Bluesky account

error.whitespace: Handle cannot contain spaces, line breaks, or tabs
